title: todo.md
summary: The document discusses the potential of edge computing in the development ecosystem and the ergo-play-boilerplate project, which provides a starting point for newcomers to the Ergo blockchain development. It includes links to the Edge and ergo-play-boilerplate GitHub repositories, as well as a link to a video on the "Completeness of Ergo" presented at the Ergoversary Summit 2023.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the ergo-play-boilerplate repository?
qa_pairs.answer: The ergo-play-boilerplate repository provides a barebone code for newcomers to jump into the world of Ergo development and get their feet wet quickly.

qa_pairs.question: What is the role of edge in the Ergo development ecosystem?
qa_pairs.answer: Edge can play a big part in the Ergo development ecosystem if it's being utilized, maintained, and improved over time.

qa_pairs.question: What is the topic of the Completeness of Ergo video by Kushti?
qa_pairs.answer: The video discusses the completeness of the Ergo blockchain platform.

qa_pairs.question: Where can the Ergo-play-boilerplate repository be found?
qa_pairs.answer: The Ergo-play-boilerplate repository can be found at https://github.com/kii-dot/ergo-play-boilerplate.

qa_pairs.question: Where can the Edge repository be found?
qa_pairs.answer: The Edge repository can be found at https://github.com/Ergo-Lend/edge.

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content:
I think that edge can play a big part in the development ecosystem if it’s being utilized, maintained and improved over time. And ergo-play-boilerplate can give newcomers barebone code to jump into the world of ergo development and get their feet wet super quickly. 

 Edge - https://github.com/Ergo-Lend/edge
Ergo-play-boilerplate - https://github.com/kii-dot/ergo-play-boilerplate 


- [Completeness of Ergo | Kushti | Ergoversary Summit 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=49UmOkx6pj0&list=PL8-KVrs6vXLRxmOmprVdXkHDcO4IaQZOY&index=2)
